name: be.rny.cc
body:
Welcome to The Coder Zone
=========================

Who am I?
---------
Hello, my name is **Berny Cantos**, and I'm a developer.
And that's fine, I'm quite proud of it. Seriously.

To code is like a mix between science and art.
You can build everything starting out from nothing.
It even defies the more elemental laws of matter! Cool!

I'm also known by my nickname **xPheRe** which is also my profile name in [Twitter](https://twitter.com/xphere) and [GitHub](https://github.com/xphere)

Repositories
------------
I'll list here links to my own public repositories.
I hope those will be useful to someone.
To care is to share!

- [OneTimeAccessBundle](/OneTimeAccessBundle) (PHP) (Symfony2 bundle)
    Easily add one-time access links to your symfony2 applications with this bundle.

- [Cache]() (PHP) (Library)
    Provides a unified set of tools for common caching tasks.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
